content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1661771389236{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1661771609076{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;}”]

We have a 25-year track record of setting up commercial gyms with state-of-the-art imported fitness equipment. Our client list speaks for itself, which includes leading Commercial Gyms / Fitness Clubs, Hotels, Corporates, Educational Institutes, Government Agencies, etc.

Checkout our gallery to view commercial gym set ups done by us in various cities.

Partner with Fitness World and save funds while setting up your gym.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1661771570332{padding-right: 30px !important;}”]

Fitness World commercial gym setup services include:

  • Supply of guaranteed state of the art Imported Commercial Fitness Equipment
  • Specialist in Commercial gym set-up that includes gym designs & layouts, business best practices and more.
  • Helping you with planning of gym layout (CAD designs)
  • Supporting you with equipment maintenance guides for all fitness equipment
  • Maintenance training

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]FOR FREE EXPERT ADVICE ENQUIRE NOW[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1661771443708{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://www.fitness-world.in/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/footer.jpg?id=19830) !important;}”]

    Fill the form to Grab the Offer

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1562738837021{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    Fitness World Advantages:

    • We are the largest commercial fitness equipment suppliers, wholesalers, distributors, and manufacturers.
    • We offer complete line of imported commercial fitness equipment lines so you don’t have to negotiate with multiple vendors.
    • We are official partners of many global fitness equipment brands including Body Solid, WaterRower, True Fitness and Paramount.
    • Our dynamic line of commercial fitness equipment, combined with our years of experience in setting up of commercial gyms will help you set up your gym at an optimal price point.
    • We have a vast network of service centers all over India, so wherever you are, our service centers will not be too far away from you!
    • Post setup, we will support you with Annual Maintenance Contracts (AMC).

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1562738865567{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    Testimonials

    We first purchased commercial fitness equipments from Fitness World way back in 2003. It’s been a strong 10 year relationship and they have always provided us with the best equipments.- Leading Gym

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

    Sona Boys Hostel, Dehradun
    8 Photos
    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]
    Indus Club, BKC Mumbai
    5 Photos
    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]
    Radius Gym, Mumbai
    7 Photos
    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_btn title=”View All” shape=”square” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fitness-world.in%2Fv3%2Fgym-installation%2F|||”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
